name: data-card-27
effect: Records the total time spent in the Pokéathlon.
short_effect: Records the total time spent in the Pokéathlon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how much time you spent participating in the Pokéathlon.

flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how much time you spent participating in the Pokéathlon.
